attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Regardless of party, there has to be an open books policy and thorough audit of all MP's expense accounts.

Gordon Brown has to consider very carefully the height of the 'Ivory Tower' that distances Whitehall from ordinary Britons in a time of economic recession.

Fat Cat pay offs and generous MP salaries and expense accounts should be constrained, audited, reviewed and capped.

It is disingenuous to think a suspect £100,000 expense account should not be challenged.

Claiming the equivalent salaries of four NHS nurses, for lodging, cannot be justified under any circumstances.

Let us bring transparency and parity into Public Office with an 'open books' policy monitored by independent adjudicators and made available upon request.
